title: As a user I want to view a list of help topics in the system
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to go to the help page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the HELP icon (?) and gets to help page
custom_expected:
THEN
- Help topics titles will be listed 
- they will be clickable links 
- Links should be in alphabetical order
- Clicking on a help topic will open the associated job aide in a new tab

title: As a user I want to click on the help icon and be directed to a help page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to go to help page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the HELP icon (?) on top nav
custom_expected:
THEN
- User will be directed to the help page
- The help icon on the top nav should be active while on the help page
- Dashboard title = Help
- Form title = Ebis Help & Support

title: As a user I want to run the CBT Assessment Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Competitive Balance Tax Assessment' report from the widget 
AND enters desired prompts
custom_expected: THEN the report will load with the entered prompts in separate tab.

title: As a user I want to run the CBT/ LRD Player Details Reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Payrolls - Player Details' report from the listing widget 
AND selects "CB" or "LRD" from Payroll Type drop down
AND click OK
custom_expected:
THEN 
"C.B. Tax Payrolls - Player Details" or "LRD 40-Man Payrolls - Player Details" report will be launched depending on the selection. Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.

title: As a user I want to run the CBT/ LRD Team Details Reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Payrolls - Team Details' report from the listing widget 
AND selects "CB" or "LRD" from Payroll Type drop down
AND click OK
custom_expected:
THEN 
"C.B. Tax Payrolls - Team Details" or "LRD 40-Man Payrolls - Team Details" report will launch depending on what was selected. Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.

title: As a user I want approving a contract to stamp the attached contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user created a MJ contract 
And attached the contract
custom_steps: When the Contract is moved to an Approved or Approved for next year state
custom_expected:
THEN
The system will add an approval stamp to the "Approvals" page of the attached contract. 
The system will need to determine what page of the uploaded pdf the Approvals page is on and stamp in the proper coordinates. 
The stamp will be same as EBIS1

title: As a user I want to be able to indicate whether a Club is taking out additional insurance on a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is creating a MJ contract
AND user is in Insurance information selection of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user checks off "Life/AD will be purchased outside of MLB's programs"
custom_expected:
THEN 
-An "Additional Insurance Amount" box to display where the Club will be required to enter an amount. (Required only if displayed)
-No maximum will be enforced on the filed and it should use the same dollar formatting that the rest of the contract uses. 
-The Printed Life Insurance form that prints as part of the Contract will reflect the addition of the amount by stating the amount that will be provided to the Club, and by reflecting the additional insurance amount in the "maximum" value that is printed on the form (currently it is always 37 million).

title: As a user I want to view an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an Employee in advanced search or on the Roster Widget
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks on the Employee name
custom_expected:
THEN the profile will load 
AND match the wireframe http://11yn8p.axshare.com/#p=info
AND only the info tab will display

title: Trade a player within Payroll Forecast Utility without selecting him first
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
AND user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
AND "Add Player" button is visible
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Player"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a modal 
AND selecting a player in the Player dropdown that already appears in the Forecast Utility should pre-populate the modal with the player's information
AND user should not be able to select a new player
BUT user should be able to edit the salary information
AND "Add/Trade Player" button should be disabled until all required fields have been entered
AND cancel button should always be available, and when clicked should dismiss the modal without making any changes to the Payroll Report
AND when "Add/Trade Player" is clicked, the player and the information entered for him, should be added to both the CBT and LRD version of the current report for the Org selected in the modal, with "Traded from ORG" in the manually changed column
AND player should appear greyed out when viewing the Org that the player originated from with the text "Traded to ORG" in the manually changed column in View mode

title: LRD adds player not in the system to payroll forecast utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Payroll Forecast Utility screen
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to enter text in the "Player" field in the Add/Trade Player modal
AND the utility should still allow for the selection of existing players
AND Text should NOT be treated as a hyperlink
BUT Player names that exist in the system should continue to appear as a hyperlink

title: LRD user adds player not in the system to details of cash tx for payroll forecast utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
AND user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Cash Considerations Portion of the Forecast Utility
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to enter text in the "Players" field in the modal, and still allow for the selection of existing players
AND text should be comma separated just as the players are, but NOT treated as a hyperlink
BUT Player names should continue to appear as a hyperlink

title: User sees cash tx from Trades and Waiver Claim Assignments on Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Cash Transactions Table on Payroll Forecast Utility 
AND user has selected an Org and Year
AND one or more Trades or Waiver claim assignments exist that impact selected org's payroll or CBT calc for the selected year
custom_expected:
THEN the table should automatically be populated with any Cash Considerations from trades or waiver claim assignments that impact selected Org's Payroll or CBT calculations for selected Year
AND logic should match ebis1 with the exception of the changes detailed with the new CBA captured in the story #129837555
AND "From" Org should be mapped to the "Payor" in the Cash Considerations table
AND "To" Org should be mapped to the "Payee" in the Cash Considerations table
AND The Players included in the trade should be listed in the "Players" section
AND If there is a "Player to be named" then that text should also appear in the Players section of the Cash Considerations table
AND The dollar amount of the Cash Consideration should be reflected accurately

title: User sees cash tx from Trades and Waiver Claim Assignments on CBT Report Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Payroll Report Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Cash Transactions Table on Payroll Report Utility 
AND user has selected an Org and Year
AND one or more Trades or Waiver claim assignments exist that impact selected org's payroll or CBT calc for the selected "As Of" date
custom_expected:
THEN the table should automatically be populated with any Cash Considerations from trades or waiver claim assignments that impact selected Org's Payroll or CBT calculations for selected Year
AND logic should match ebis1 with the exception of the changes detailed with the new CBA captured in the story #129837555
AND "From" Org should be mapped to the "Payor" in the Cash Considerations table
AND "To" Org should be mapped to the "Payee" in the Cash Considerations table
AND The Players included in the trade should be listed in the "Players" section
AND If there is a "Player to be named" then that text should also appear in the Players section of the Cash Considerations table
AND The dollar amount of the Cash Consideration should be reflected accurately

title: View existing Saved Payroll Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a Year and selects anything OTHER than "New"
custom_expected:
THEN the View button becomes active 
AND clicking View will load the saved report

title: Generate a New Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility 
AND has selected a Year and "New" for Type [C182117]
AND has completed the "As of" and "Save As" fields 
AND the Generate Button is now active
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Generate
custom_expected:
THEN  Clicking Generate will generate the CBT Impact Player Details Report, and the LRD Impact Player Details report and display the report in the utility, per the wireframe (styling and other specifics to be handled in follow up stories). 
AND CBT Impact Player Details will be displayed by default. 

AND Wireframe:
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report

title: LRD User Edits Payroll Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Saved or newly generated Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Edit
custom_expected:
THEN the form will load in edit mode 
AND all filters will become disabled 
AND only the totals and any rows associated with players that have been removed will not be editable. All other fields will be editable

title: LRD User Saves changes to a Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has made edits to a Payroll Report [C182455]
AND is still in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN all entered values will be saved 
AND the form will load in view mode 
AND a successful blue notification will display

title: Club user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the club user has logged in 
AND has clicked Major Contracts from the Left nav tab
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Deferred Compensation Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the Club's Deferred Compensation funding utility will load 
AND The Org displayed will be locked to the Club user's Org (cannot view other Orgs). 
AND "Funding As Of" will default to July of the current year through July, and July of the following year through December. (Ex: In August 2016 this will read July 2017) 
AND Discount Rate is defaulted to 5%.

title: View player's details in the Deferred Comp funding screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp funding screen 
AND is viewing an Org's Deferred Comp
custom_steps: WHEN the user expands the row of a specific player
custom_expected: THEN expanding a row will display as many rows as are needed within that expansion to capture the information for the player, including all payment sources relevant to the current values entered into the Deferred Comp Funding screen.

title: As a user I want to view each payment source
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Screen 
AND if viewing a specific's Org's Deferred Comp
custom_steps: WHEN they expand a Player row
custom_expected:
THEN the sources column will change from the number of sources when the row was unexpanded to listening out each payment source. 
AND the number of payment sources should match the number that displayed when the row was unexpanded 
AND Each Payment Source will display the Date, Amount and Present Value of the deferred compensation associated with that payment source. 
AND  Each player will also have a Payment Source labeled "Totals" that will display the total Amount deferred (Amt), the total amount funded as of the entered date (fnd) and the present value of the deferred comp (PV) and the present value of the funded deferred comp (Fnd PV).
